_sText:
**This is my entry for [the halloween entry](http://www.gamebanana.com/news/20055 "the halloween contest.")**

**cs _ hostelity**
==================
The haunted mansion has been left alone for centuries now. Lately People from the city have gone missing. 
Rumors say they are held hostage in the mansion by a unknown terrorist group.
You and your swat team have to go inside the mansion and see if there are any hostagas to be rescued.

**Features**
==================
- HDR (Tonemap Controller used)
- Soundscape (Indoors and Outdoors)
- 3d skybox
- Detail
- 32 spawn points
- Nav file included

Update:
=======
-Noise added to mountain/cave.
-Added some crates for hiding.
-Removed fog

**Note**
I tried to create a scary ambience. So I left some spots pretty dark on purpose.
For optimal experience make sure it is allowed to use _flashlights_. 

Installation
==================
To install, unpack the .rar file to:

"Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps"

Comment & Rate
==================  
Please give constructive feedback and rate.
I've spend alot of time in this map so I'd really appreciate.

I hope you enjoy playing this map.

![](http://www.gamersofthewest.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/halloween.jpg "Halloween")
